Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Exterior Hull, Eden III Colony Ship'}
{3: 'Meanwhile...'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Signal is steady, posture looks good.'}
{3: 'The transport aircraft slices through the emptiness, and the recon team braces for their final drop assault.'}
{3: 'The world outside is shrouded in heavy, gray gloom, as if the craft is flying blind.'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Switch to DCS rangefinding.'}
{2: 'Fire Control Operator', 3: "Range at 240, silhouette is nominal. Detecting unusual ionization on the target's shell."}
{2: 'Fire Control Operator', 3: 'The autocannon is loaded with AP sabot rounds. Ready to breach the hull on your command.'}
{3: 'The pilot nudges the control stick gently, and the aircraft tips at a subtle angle before shifting course.'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Approach vector 709—circle the target and scan for any openings we can exploit...'}
{2: 'Fire Control Operator', 3: 'Target in sight!'}
{3: "Beneath the craft's towering, mountain-like dome, a slender breach stretching dozens of meters across stands out in stark relief."}
{3: "It's obvious the metal framework and its composite coating have been ripped apart by raw force—the jagged edges bear the unmistakable marks of a violent blast."}
{3: 'After a quick burst of thruster fire to adjust their posture, the Constructs strapped in their seats feel the sudden end of all acceleration.'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Power down the main engine. Switch to VTOL thrusters.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Brace to connect with the hull.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Issarius and Daemon each command their Construct squads to buckle up and prepare for impact.'}
{3: 'No one expected the descent to proceed this smoothly.'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'We move inside the target, encountering no resistance.'}
{2: 'Fire Control Operator', 3: 'Lights on—initiating active radar scan.'}
{3: "They've had some intel from the briefing, but when the searchlight finally cuts through the darkness under that dome, everyone goes silent."}
{3: 'Beneath her mask, she draws a deep breath.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Green light. All squads—initiate rope drop.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Hammer-216, keep that belly turret hot. We need this LZ secure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pilot & Fire Control Operator', 3: 'Understood.'}
{3: 'Facing the tail hatch as it slowly opens, the team leader fastens the grappling hook to the ring at his waist.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: '...I never imagined a place like this could actually be real.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Daemon', 3: 'Just how many more secrets are those bigwigs keeping from us?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'They stare into the vast expanse beyond the hatch, each letting out a stunned gasp of wonder.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'All units, cut the chatter.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She understands that the looming threat allows for no distractions whatsoever.'}
{3: 'Once she issues the command, Discord hurls herself out of the cabin.'}
{3: 'Whoosh!'}
{3: 'With the scrape of alloy cables, the squad members descend from the transport craft one by one.'}
{2: 'Fire Control Operator', 3: "...Seven o'clock! The readings... Corrupted activity detected!"}
{2: 'Fire Control Operator', 3: 'Autocannon barrage in progress!'}
{3: 'An ear-splitting screech rips through the air as blazing shell casings pour down like a copper waterfall.'}
{3: 'Tracer rounds and live ordnance leave no gap between them. Their fluorescent green paths cut straight toward the Corrupted on the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: '...!! Brace for impact!', 4: '18'}
{3: 'The hull shudders, sending the steel cables swaying like wind chimes. Construct soldiers quickly unfasten the locks on their waist harnesses, bracing for the next impact.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: '...Argh!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory264.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.9', 5: '0'}
{3: 'A hollow thump echoes as the first operative hits the ground head-on.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier A', 3: 'Landing complete!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He smoothly detaches the magnetically locked rifle from his back and flicks the selector from "safe" to "full auto".'}
{3: 'But a Corrupted straggler strikes first.'}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Unidentified intruders—initiate the purge.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Right behind them, a blue-haired Construct lands, blocking the Corrupted's lethal strike with a swift twist of a combat blade."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'The entire squad completes their rappel.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "We've made it inside the ship... Not a single step off.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{3: 'They form a fan-shaped search pattern, keeping a wary eye on their surroundings.'}
{3: 'Petal-shaped lampposts, a café alive with greenery by the roadside, and a sleek, seashell-like support frame.'}
{3: 'Sometimes there are even birds flying through under the sky up high.'}
{3: "It's almost the same with Babylonia."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Issarius', 3: "But it's... as silent as a grave.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Compared to Babylonia, the biggest difference here is the total absence of any human presence.'}
{3: 'The orderlies, the kids and teachers, even the workers returning from the ground-level conservation areas—every last one of them is gone.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "This entire residential district feels like it's been deserted for ages.", 4: '1'}

{3: 'They have no way of knowing that the rightful inhabitants of this place have already been sealed away in cryogenic vaults. Meanwhile, just a short distance away, an exclusive night-long celebration for the elite continues unabated.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Daemon', 3: 'So this is... the so-called Eden III Colony ship?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The team keeps a sharp eye on the motion scanner, looking for any sign of the Punishing corruption's origin within Las Prados."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront30.png', 3: '0.3', 4: '4'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryQujingkuang.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory262.png'}
{3: 'The signal leads them to a towering domed facility at the far end of the plaza...'}
{3: 'The neon sign bearing the name "San Lorenzo" is battered and broken, but it still sparks vivid memories of its dazzling golden heyday.'}
{3: "In the corner of each individual's HUD, a foreboding message glows to life:"}
{1: 'Mission Coordinates: 36°14′N, 114°59′W', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.25', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 6: '1', 7: '-3', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Mission Location: New Neilis Air Force Base, Las Prados', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.25', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'Mission Altitude: -162 meters', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '0.25', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 6: '1', 7: '-1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryQujingkuang.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Babylonia Bridge', 2: 'Six hours earlier'}
{3: 'Babylonia Bridge, Six hours ago'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liszt', 3: '...My father never mentioned that this insane plan was still in motion.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You've been in Kurono before. You already know how they operate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "So you do know something about Project Bokonon, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liszt', 3: 'Yes. The Eden III Colony Ship...a vessel fated never to embark.', 4: '2'}
